word:
There is nothing that converts the people like the medical missionary work. This work makes the path straight before us, and bears the impress that it is of God. Jesus is in the work, and He cannot be hid. Letter 76, 1899, p. 5. (To "Dear Brethren in America," April 26, 1899.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. January 5, 1955
